badcompression.huffman

Class HuffmanCoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • badcompression.huffman.HuffmanCoding

  • public class HuffmanCoding
extends Object
    Creates Huffman coding based on character frequencies.
    Author:
    antti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HuffmanCoding(long[] charFreq, boolean createCharCodes)
      Creates a Huffman coding tree based on character frequencies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HuffmanCoding

        public HuffmanCoding(long[] charFreq,
                     boolean createCharCodes)
        Creates a Huffman coding tree based on character frequencies. If createCharCodes is true, the tree is read for individual binary codings for each character.
        Parameters:
        charFreq -
        createCharCodes -
